name: pgarciapg-plugins
description: Pablo's collection of Claude Code plugins including design tools and notifications

plugins.name: design-team
plugins.description: A multi-agent design department for Claude Code: UX, visual, copy, accessibility, tokens, and implementation

plugins.name: domain-scout
plugins.description: AI-powered domain name finder that analyzes your codebase, generates creative name suggestions, and searches registrars for availability and pricing

plugins.name: dev-workflow-teams
plugins.description: Development workflow team compositions with specialized agent task assignments

plugins.name: dev-toolkit
plugins.description: Code quality lifecycle agents: debug, test, refactor, and document. Provides systematic approaches to root cause analysis, test strategy design, behavior-preserving refactoring, and technical documentation.

plugins.name: react-perf
plugins.description: React and Next.js performance optimization guidelines with 40+ prioritized rules. Covers waterfall elimination, bundle optimization, server-side performance, re-render optimization, and more.
